entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:30 PM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -39.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 9:00 PM CST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -39.5°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 9:30 PM CST Thursday 09 February 2023
